originalText.text: I have had a wonderful experience with Carole that has impacted my life in so many positive ways. Her work is very goal and action oriented which is both extremely effective and has also made me feel like I'm doing the work and making progress throughout the entire process. Specifically she has been helpful in working to identify triggers for anxiety/conflict and developing concrete skills to address and overcome them. Carole has also been a wonderful resource for professional development.  I can't recommend her enough as a therapist!!

Carole has also been a wonderful resource for professional development.  I can't recommend her enough as a therapist!!

originalText.text: Carole is a very professional and educated behavioral therapist. She's very kind and offers very practical solutions. A 45-minute session goes by fast, but at the end I always feel an improvement in my problem.

text.text: Carole is a very professional and educated behavioral therapist. She's very kind and offers very practical solutions. A 45-minute session goes by fast, but at the end I always feel an improvement in my problem.

originalText.text: Carole Spivack is an effective, insightful professional that provides clarity and support through life’s trajectory. She utilizes solution focused, creative modalities to enhance communication, relationships, and wellbeing. Her passion is evident in her powerful work and I recommend her highly.

text.text: Carole Spivack is an effective, insightful professional that provides clarity and support through life’s trajectory. She utilizes solution focused, creative modalities to enhance communication, relationships, and wellbeing. Her passion is evident in her powerful work and I recommend her highly.

originalText.text: Carole is an excellent therapist! Her action oriented approach has provided me practical tools to help in my day to day functioning and well being. She listens while also ensuring the sessions are productive. She endorses a holistic approach that includes medication if need be and lifestyle changes, all in addition to regular therapy. Just in a few months I have felt a significant improvement in multiple facets.

She listens while also ensuring the sessions are productive. She endorses a holistic approach that includes medication if need be and lifestyle changes, all in addition to regular therapy. Just in a few months I have felt a significant improvement in multiple facets.

originalText.text: Carole is an excellent therapist! I have been working with her a few years. She listens thoughtfully and often provides strategies/tools to use outside of sessions.
